casebody.data:
WILLIAM H. SYKES, Employee
v.
MOSS TRUCKING COMPANY, INC., Employer, and PROTECTIVE INSURANCE COMPANY, INC., Carrier. No. 153P04 Supreme Court of North Carolina May 6, 2004

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 31st day of March 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of May 2004.
